id.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of this profile attribute type

type.description: The type of this object - always `assessment_questions`

assessment_answer_category.description: Category is the section in the Create Move form that a profile attribute appears in, e.g. Health or Risks

nomis_alert_type.description: The NOMIS alert type for this profile attribute type

nomis_alert_code.description: The NOMIS alert code for this profile attribute type

description.description: The label displayed on the Create Move form for this profile attribute type
